ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 14 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging - EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Full Size Tripod w/ Case - DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - 5 Piece Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - RC-4 Remote
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens & 11 Piece Bundle with 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
